blog.title: web development
blog.author: walker
blog.body: development is the work involved in developing a website for the Internet (World Wide Web) or an intranet (a private network).

blog.title: Web 2.0
blog.author: john doe
blog.body: a term popularised by Dale Dougherty, then vice president of O'Reilly, during a 2004 conference with Media Live, marks a shift in internet usage, emphasizing interactivity

blog.title: Web 3.0
blog.author: mary doe
blog.body: , considered the third and current version of the web, was introduced in 2014. The concept envisions a complete redesign of the

blog.title: Analysis
blog.author: anty doe
blog.body: Debra Howcraft and John Carroll proposed a methodology in which web development process can be divided into sequential steps

blog.title: Technology analysis
blog.author: uncle doe
blog.body: Identification of all necessary technological components and tools for constructing, hosting, and supporting the site.
